rathri 10 pahuwela.mama parata bassa.bonna thanak naha.mata wiyadam karanna puluwan simitha mudalak.mama eeth kotikawaththa handiyen thriwil ekak aragena pitakotuwata aawa.pitakotuwe idala galu pare gol fes haraha payin aawa. 90 dashakaye me widihata ananthawath bambalapitiye idala pitakotuwata awith athi.mama ee upakramaya yalith pitakotuwe idala bambalapitiyata yoda gaththa.polisiya langa arala thiyena kade idala sigarat ganna puluwan than walin sigarat gaththa.biwwa.andure aswalata thethwenna ariya.nawatha bambalapitiye idala pitakotuwata ee de ma kala.kakula ussan inna bari tharamata ridenawa.me dinawala sahenna wiwekayak nolabama aැnga wagema hithath wehesana nisa wenna athi me tharam mahansiyak.dan duwa wenuwen nemeyi mage shariraye kotaswalin nangena wedanawatath mata handena tharam.
